com.angryelectron.fona

Class FonaEmailMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.angryelectron.fona.FonaEmailMessage

  • public class FonaEmailMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    Fona E-mail message object.
    • Send messages: Fona.emailSMTPSend(com.angryelectron.fona.FonaEmailMessage)
    • Receive messages: Fona.emailPOP3Get(boolean)
    • Login to SMTP: Fona.emailSMTPLogin(java.lang.String, java.lang.Integer)
    • Login to POP: Fona.emailPOP3Login(java.lang.String, java.lang.Integer, java.lang.String, java.lang.String)
